I wonder if it’s worth it to have a pair of headphones that are worth this much. It seems like it’s a lot of money for these headphones. Granted they are an esoteric brand and not a pair of beats headphones that are another brand that are overrated for what they are..

I think the diminishing rate of return starts about that $500 dollar mark and anything over that you are starting to pay for what you think might be better sounding cans.
